EmailTemplate.name: ENG-30-Day Trial Nurture.10-Green Circle Community.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic Top Ten Features #10: Green Circle Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid10]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
You did it! 10 of 10 Turbonomic Top Features! #10 isn't exactly a feature, but a huge benefit whether you choose to pursue Turbonomic or not. The Green Circle Community <[[https://greencircle.turbonomic.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid10]]> is Turbonomic's free online community where you can:
- Find answers to ALL of your Turbonomic-related questions - Access publicly-available Custom Reports developed by others - Expand your network with other forward-thinking IT Pros - Learn more about all of the latest in enterprise technology - Earn virtual points redeemable for swag in the Green Circle Store
At-A-Glance: Green Circle Community <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid10]]>
- Industry Perspectives <[[https://greencircle.turbonomic.com/community/industry-perspectives/content?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid10]]> discusses cutting-edge technologies, along with other topics of interest - Product Forum <[[https://greencircle.turbonomic.com/community/products/content?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid10]]> is the perfect resource to address issues or ask questions specific to Turbonomic - GC Store <[[https://greencircle.turbonomic.com/store?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ENG-HybridCloud&utm_content=Mid10]]> is where you can cash-in points for swag and other cool prizes! - If and when you become a Turbonomic customer, you will receive access to the VIP Forum which gives you access to the Green Circle in its entirety - exclusive video, interviews, and other VIP content!
